channel.title: Jenkins on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Jenkins on Modernization workshop

item.title: Cloud Automation at Scale with Quali
item.description: Gain hands-on experience with Quali, an AWS advanced technology ISV partner, to automatically deploy and release an e-commerce application as part of your DevOps practice.

item.title: CI/CD with CloudBees
item.description: In this workshop we will learn some best practices around CI/CD that will allow you to rapidly deliver features that will help differentiate your business and reduce time-to-market.
